NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 262? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 167? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from WeberGroupMart to GillespieShop or from Carter-RyanOnline to GillespieShop?
NC.A: The flow from {WeberGroupMart} to {GillespieShop} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from GillespieShop to Carter-RyanOnline, from Carter-RyanOnline to WeberGroupMart, or from GillespieShop to WeberGroupMart?

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {GillespieShop} and {WeberGroupMart}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc WeberGroupMart, Arc GillespieShop, Arc Carter-RyanOnline}.
